articles.description: Max Verstappen sets the fastest time in Friday practice at the Japanese Grand Prix as the second session was rendered useless by the weather.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix: Max Verstappen tops first practice as Logan Sargeant crashes

articles.description: Bronny James, the son of NBA legend LeBron, is to enter the 2024 NBA draft.
articles.title: Bronny James, son of LeBron, set to enter 2024 NBA draft

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on darts stars Luke Littler and Nathan Aspinall to predict the outcome of this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v darts stars Littler & Aspinall

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text updates as Scotland visit Serbia in their opening Euro 2025 qualifier.
articles.title: Watch: Euro 2025 qualifier - Scotland start campaign in Serbia

articles.description: The trunks worn by Muhammad Ali in his epic 'Thrilla in Manila' victory over Joe Frazier are expected to fetch more than $6m at auction.
articles.title: 'Thrilla in Manila': Muhammad Ali's iconic white trunks from epic bout expected to fetch $6m at auction

articles.description: Inaki and Nico Williams' parents travelled to Bilbao from Ghana hoping the city would change their sons' lives. Their sons, in turn, have changed the city.
articles.title: Two brothers, one club and a 40-year wait

articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino believes Cole Palmer has proved that he is a "top player" after his hat-trick helped Chelsea secure a dramatic win against Manchester United.
articles.title: Impossible not to call Palmer top player - Pochettino

articles.description: Ronda Rousey reveals she hid "concussions and neurological injuries" during her trailblazing run as UFC bantamweight champion.
articles.title: Ronda Rousey: Ex-UFC bantamweight champion 'hid concussions and neurological injuries'

articles.description: England pace bowler Jofra Archer will not make his Test return this summer but the T20 World Cup in June is a realistic goal, says managing director Rob Key.
articles.title: Archer will not play Test cricket until 2025

articles.description: Tour de France champion Jonas Vingegaard suffered a collapsed lung in Thursday's crash in the Itzulia Basque Country race.
articles.title: Jonas Vingegaard suffered lung injuries in Itzulia Basque Country crash
